video.title: Arrested Development
video.synopsis: It's the Emmy-winning story of a wealthy family that lost everything, and the one son who had no choice but to keep them all together.

episodes.synopsis: After his father fails to promote him within the family business, Michael accepts a job in Arizona -- until his dad is arrested for shady bookkeeping.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When Michael attempts to gain control of the family business, his imprisoned father won't let him, leading to the banana stand's destruction.
episodes.title: Top Banana

episodes.synopsis: A reluctant Michael takes Buster under his wing while attempting to get closer to an increasingly distant George-Michael.
episodes.title: Bringing Up Buster

episodes.synopsis: Michael falls in love with Gob's girlfriend. Meanwhile, Lindsay bonds with an environmentalist, and Buster gets a romantic note from Lucille's rival.
episodes.title: Key Decisions

episodes.synopsis: Michael trades in his bicycle for his father's car and ends up giving a ride to a terrified stranger who mistakes Michael for a killer.
episodes.title: Charity Drive

episodes.synopsis: After receiving a tip about Bluth's international accounts, Michael uses Gob to get information out of George Sr.'s secretary.
episodes.title: Visiting Ours

episodes.synopsis: The family attorney arranges George Sr.'s release from prison for Christmas. Later, George-Michael has to wear an embarrassing codpiece in a pageant.
episodes.title: In God We Trust

episodes.synopsis: Michael loses short-term memory after he and Lucille have a car accident. George-Michael and Maeby want to see an R-rated movie about cousins in love.
episodes.title: My Mother, the Car

episodes.synopsis: Michael decides to expose Marta to Gob's womanizing by having her participate in a magic trick that involves one of Gob's many girlfriends.
episodes.title: Storming the Castle

episodes.synopsis: When Buster asks George-Michael to buy him marijuana to treat Lucille Austero's vertigo, Michael stages a phony bust to teach George-Michael a lesson.
episodes.title: Pier Pressure

episodes.synopsis: After having a tough time getting George-Michael admitted to a private school, Michael hires an attractive publicist to change the family's image.
episodes.title: Public Relations

episodes.synopsis: Michael delivers a speech about love that makes Marta realize she has feelings for him. George-Michael realizes that Maeby might not be his cousin.
episodes.title: Marta Complex

episodes.synopsis: Michael tells Gob about his flirtation with Marta. Meanwhile, George-Michael tries to determine whether he and Maeby are related by blood.
episodes.title: Beef Consomme

episodes.synopsis: Michael falls for George-Michael's new ethics teacher, and George Sr. receives a visit from one of his fans, not knowing she's an undercover agent.
episodes.title: Shock and Aww

episodes.synopsis: Michael learns that most of his family is on the company payroll despite not working there. Gob and Buster are sent to work at the construction site.
episodes.title: Staff Infection

episodes.synopsis: Michael has a one-night stand with a blind woman, who turns out to be his father's prosecutor. Cindi tells George Sr. that she's in love with him.
episodes.title: Altar Egos

episodes.synopsis: While grappling with the dilemma of whether or not to open his father's case file, Michael discovers the truth about Maggie.
episodes.title: Justice is Blind

episodes.synopsis: Michael disobeys his father and fires the incompetent Kitty, who could reveal secrets that would further damage the family's reputation.
episodes.title: Missing Kitty

episodes.synopsis: Gob throws a bachelor party to scare a company accountant -- who's getting ready to testify against George Sr. -- into believing he killed a stripper.
episodes.title: Best Man for the Gob

episodes.synopsis: As his entire family targets company funds that have recently become unfrozen, Michael purchases some ultimately worthless land from his Uncle Oscar.
episodes.title: Whistler's Mother

episodes.synopsis: Police attempt to pin Kitty's disappearance on Michael. Meanwhile, Michael brings Maeby along with him for "Take Your Daughter to Work Day."
episodes.title: Not Without My Daughter

episodes.synopsis: Michael discovers the secret behind his father's financial woes, and George Sr. has a heart attack in prison and makes his escape from the hospital.
episodes.title: Let 'Em Eat Cake

episodes.synopsis: In the Season 2 opener, Michael fears he may be facing prison time when the scandal linking the company to a business deal in Iraq becomes public.
episodes.title: The One Where Michael Leaves

episodes.synopsis: Michael's new business model backfires when he tries to build a home in two weeks; Lindsay's transient date turns out to be actor Thomas Jane.
episodes.title: The One Where They Build a House

episodes.synopsis: Michael journeys to Mexico to hunt for his missing father; Buster tries to avoid the Army by fleeing the country... or so he thinks.
episodes.title: iAmigos!

episodes.synopsis: Michael and his family stage a wake for George Sr.; Gob plans to pull off an elaborate magic trick; George-Michael gets dumped by his girlfriend.
episodes.title: Good Grief

episodes.synopsis: After linking the Bluth Co. to weapons of mass destruction in Iraq, the government makes Michael an offer he can't refuse.
episodes.title: Sad Sack

episodes.synopsis: After getting roasted at Bluth's company Christmas party, Gob fires the entire staff, forcing Michael to come up with a way to rehire the employees.
episodes.title: Afternoon Delight

episodes.synopsis: Michael tells his father he'll win a softball game pitting Bluth employees against a rival; Lucille tries to keep Buster from getting sent overseas.
episodes.title: Switch Hitter

episodes.synopsis: The family loses control of the business after the company's stock is unfrozen; Michael purchases a red Corvette; Tobias buys a club for drag queens.
episodes.title: Queen for a Day

episodes.synopsis: Michael attempts to woo Sitwell's daughter; Tobias hunts down a wolf to prove to Lindsay that he's a man; George-Michael attends a Christian bonfire.
episodes.title: Burning Love

episodes.synopsis: As Valentine's Day approaches, Michael "pimps" Lindsay to save the family business from Lucille Austero, who's snapping up shares of Bluth stock.
episodes.title: Ready, Aim, Marry Me!

episodes.synopsis: After running into a pregnant Maggie Lizer, Michael wants to know if he's the baby's father; Buster learns that he's soon to be deployed to Iraq.
episodes.title: Out on a Limb

episodes.synopsis: Michael continues his inquiry into the paternity of Maggie's baby; Gob seeks a seal after Buster swims in the ocean and gets his hand bitten off.
episodes.title: Hand to God

episodes.synopsis: Lucille takes George-Michael to an embarrassing dance that promotes mother-son bonding; Tobias lands an acting gig in a biopic... playing George Sr.
episodes.title: Motherboy XXX

episodes.synopsis: Gob helps George-Michael's campaign for class president; Lucille catches Buster having sex with her maid; Tobias impersonates a singing British nanny.
episodes.title: The Immaculate Election

episodes.synopsis: Gob and Buster perform a new magic trick using a sword; Michael is forced to give up control of the company after being admitted to the hospital.
episodes.title: Sword of Destiny

episodes.synopsis: Michael hopes to foil George-Michael's plan to get pre-engaged by letting Ann's ultraconservative parents meet his family.
episodes.title: Meat the Veals

episodes.synopsis: Kitty kidnaps George Sr. and threatens to bring down the Bluth Co. with a cooler of evidence; Lindsay confronts the producer of a spring break video.
episodes.title: Spring Breakout

episodes.synopsis: Michael gets arrested after a traffic camera photographs him in a car with George Sr.; George-Michael and Ann protest a movie about cousins in love.
episodes.title: The Righteous Brothers

episodes.synopsis: On a tip from Barry, Michael looks for his father in Reno; George-Michael and Maeby want to finish the kiss they started; Lindsay wants Tobias back.
episodes.title: The Cabin Show

episodes.synopsis: Michael falls in love with a beautiful British woman while investigating his father's claim that a British construction firm set him up as a patsy.
episodes.title: For British Eyes Only

episodes.synopsis: Michael hides his family from Rita; George Sr. tries to escape house arrest by floating away on balloons; Tobias aims to boost Buster's confidence.
episodes.title: Forget Me Now

episodes.synopsis: Michael participates in a father-son triathlon with nephew Steve Holt; George Sr. mistakenly lectures a group of young gay men about prison life.
episodes.title: Notapusy

episodes.synopsis: Trevor tells Rita that Michael must be eliminated; the family tries to trick Japanese investors; George-Michael mistakes a jet pack as a gift.
episodes.title: Mr. F

episodes.synopsis: Complications ensue when Michael decides that he wants to marry Rita, unaware that she's mentally challenged -- and incredibly rich.
episodes.title: The Ocean Walker

episodes.synopsis: After reading the warden's script, Michael thinks he's trying to seduce Lucille; Gob shoots a video for a benefit so Tobias can keep his hair plugs.
episodes.title: Prison Break-In

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Gob join forces to teach their father a lesson; Lucille recuperates after undergoing plastic surgery; Lindsay sues for divorce.
episodes.title: Making a Stand

episodes.synopsis: At George Sr.'s behest, the family hosts a dinner to benefit its legal fund; George-Michael attends an exclusive school; Gob gets a job as a waiter.
episodes.title: S.O.B.s

episodes.synopsis: When Michael represents his family at a mock trial, Buster pretends he's comatose to avoid testifying; Michael learns he may have a long-lost sister.
episodes.title: Fakin' It

episodes.synopsis: Michael tracks down the mysterious woman who may be his sister; George-Michael and Maeby learn that their mock marriage is real.
episodes.title: Family Ties

episodes.synopsis: After Gob is imprisoned by American forces, Michael and Buster travel to Iraq to free him; George-Michael throws a surprise birthday party for Maeby.
episodes.title: Exit Strategy

episodes.synopsis: Michael tries to keep family members from selling their shares of company stock; George-Michael tells his father about being attracted to Maeby.
episodes.title: Development Arrested

episodes.synopsis: Michael says goodbye to the family business and starts his own. And the life of the family is turned upside down when their mailman Pete dies.
episodes.title: Flight of the Phoenix

episodes.synopsis: George Sr. comes up with a get rich scam after his family falls apart.
episodes.title: Borderline Personalities

episodes.synopsis: Lindsay tries to reclaim her sense of self while traveling and getting back to her political activist roots.
episodes.title: Indian Takers

episodes.synopsis: Michael is presented with a new business opportunity that could change his life. Unfortunately, he needs his family to sign off.
episodes.title: The B. Team

episodes.synopsis: Tobias searches for meaning after splitting with Lindsay, only to find that old habits die hard.
episodes.title: A New Start

episodes.synopsis: George Sr.'s new business hits a rough patch, and he must bribe a politician to get his scam back on track.
episodes.title: Double Crossers

episodes.synopsis: Gob finds a new group of friends after his relationship falls apart and his family abandons him.
episodes.title: Colony Collapse

episodes.synopsis: Lindsay continues to push away from being a Bluth by embracing a relationship and finding a new career.
episodes.title: Red Hairing

episodes.synopsis: Tobias returns to his roots and reunites with his leading lady after a rough few weeks.
episodes.title: Smashed

episodes.synopsis: Lucille finds that her children have already started divvying up her things, and adjusts to her new home.
episodes.title: Queen B.

episodes.synopsis: Gob accepts a job from his brother, but is distracted by a scheme of his own.
episodes.title: A New Attitude

episodes.synopsis: Maeby moves out on her own and reconnects with her cousin, George-Michael.
episodes.title: Señoritis

episodes.synopsis: At UC Irvine things get steamy when George-Michael finds himself in a love triangle with his best friend Ray and his girlfriend Becky.
episodes.title: It Gets Better

episodes.synopsis: Buster struggles to make it on his own and break away from his overbearing mother.
episodes.title: Off the Hook

episodes.synopsis: George-Michael tries to reconnect with his father, but is finding himself overwhelmed by the responsibility of running his business.
episodes.title: Blockheads
